column4: hello, can anyone help me change my uid? usermod -u # name doesn't work for me as I only have one user and don't know how to log in as root
you can use the user & group tools from system->administration
in user&groups tools,you must click in the lower icon with the graphics of a key and type your root password
umm hmm, did that. as I am loggen in it won't let me change it though : (
